service.title: IMPACT Gimp Image Conversion Service ..
service.description: Perform image format conversion operations for most commonly used image file formats using the GNU Image Manipulation Program. Implementation is based on GIMP Fu-Scripts which makes the process configurable to a very detailed level.

service.title: IMPACT ImageMagick Image Conversion Service
service.description: Perform image conversion operations for most commonly used image file formats using the ImageMagick software suite. Implementation is based on the ImageMagick Command-line Tools.
